商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 女款 Classic-Fit 扭袖圓領 T 恤
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 黑色
留言內容: The fabric is a nice weight, and the construction seems to be okay. I would say the item runs true to size, but is a slim/body skimming fit. I have not washed it, so I don't know how it will hold up. If you're interested in a relaxed fit or are very busty, I would recommend sizing up. The twist on the sleeves is a cute detail and is similar to another shirt I bought from a different retailer for far more money; however, the sleeves are an awkward length. The twisted band hits right at the largest part of my bicep, which is not the most flattering. I also think the shirttail is very long, but I'll probably wear this tucked into skirts, so that's not a huge deal, but I could never wear it untucked. The price is good, and it is a step up from a basic T. I'd say it's worth the $12.50 price tag, but I'm glad I didn't pay more.
